name: io.github.dynatrace-oss/dynatrace-managed-mcp
description: MCP server for Dynatrace Managed to access logs, events, and metrics.

environmentVariables.name: DT_MANAGED_ENVIRONMENT
environmentVariables.description: id of the managed environment, used for constructing URL for API and dashboards (e.g. of the form `01234567-89ab-cdef-abcd-ef0123456789`)

environmentVariables.name: DT_API_ENDPOINT_URL
environmentVariables.description: base url for Dynatrace Managed API, to which the environment id will be appended (e.g. `https://abc123.dynatrace-managed.com:9999`)

environmentVariables.name: DT_DYNATRACE_URL
environmentVariables.description: base url for Dynatrace Managed dashboard, to which the environment id will be appended (e.g. `https://dmz123.dynatrace-managed.com`)

environmentVariables.name: LOG_LEVEL
environmentVariables.description: Logging level (e.g. debug, info, warning, error)
